 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּף‎</span>] **verb** ==bruise== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁוּף‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפַף‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***rub off, away, grind*** ([[Exod.32.20|Exod 32:20]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טָחַן‎</span>); see especially [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Gn</sup>; &gt; [[BDB#Di|Di]] and others think \|\| form of I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁאף‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular + 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוּא יְשׁוּפְךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראֹשׁ וְּאַתָּה תְּשׁוּפֶנּוּ עָקֵב‎</span> [[Gen.3.15|Gen 3:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁרבִּֿשְׂעָרָה יְשׁוּפֵנִי‎</span> [[Job.9.17|Job 9:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַךְ השֶׁךְ יְשׁוּפֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.139.11|Ps 139:11]] meaning unsuitable, read perhaps with [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] and others <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשׂוּבֵּנִי‎</span> ***cover, screen, me***. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺפַךְ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺבַךְ‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּפָמִי‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפוּפָם‎</span> below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁפף‎</span>.
